title: GodfatherBond
author: GodfatherBond
content: Does any Exchange accept UnionPay card for deposit? Tried Gate.io, but their CC processor for UnionPay (Mercuryo) for some reason doesn't accept the card.

comments.author: MontPythonn
comments.body: I can exchange for 25% fee. Min 150$.Contact me on tg or PM

comments.author: aew
comments.body: If you can add it to google pay thentry Banxa and pay by google  pay

comments.author: GodfatherBond
comments.body: Quote from: aew on November 20, 2022, 01:46:09 AMIf you can add it to google pay thentry Banxa and pay by google  paythx for advice. Unfortunately, that doesn't not work. It seems UnionPay is blocked in Europe in many places online and offline, which I feel is a good indicator to push DeFI even more without regulations. this is ridiculous, I can't withdraw my money because of traditional finance such as ATM networks have chosen to block UnionPay cards quite much everywhere... at least in EU.

comments.author: GodfatherBond
comments.body: For those who are wondering what's UnionPay = one of the biggest card issuers in the world, even bigger than Visa and Mastercard... their only fault is that they are Chinese corporation and a lot of russians are using their cards. I'm not russian nor chinese. This is really the field of which cryptos are intended for. For taking control of your own finances. But it doesn't really work if there's no connection to fiat money - at least yet. Let's invent something that works.
